description:
Generates an `input` element (optionally wrapped in a label) and accepts
most of the common input types.

params.name:
{
  note,
  defaultValue,
  displayError = false,
  isDisabled = false,
  isFilter = false,
  isOptional,
  isReadOnly,
  onBlur,
  isRequired,
  label,
  min,
  max,
  onChange,
  onInput,
  onKeyDown,
  onFocus,
  placeholder,
  testSection,
  type,
  value,
}

defaultValue.description: The default value of the input used on initial render

isDisabled.description: Prevents input from being modified and appears disabled

isReadOnly.description: Prevents input from being modified but doesn't appear disabled

isRequired.description: Prevents input from being submitted without value

max.description: Max value for the `input`. Should be used only when `type` is `number`.

min.description: Min value for the `input`. Should be used only when `type` is `number`.

onBlur.description:
Function that fires when the input loses focus. It fires regardless of
whether the value has changed.

onChange.description: Function that fires when the input loses focus after the value changes

onFocus.description: Function that fires when the input gains focus

onKeyDown.description: Function that fires when a key is pressed down
